reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this Premier Inn as we arrived back late on a flight that was late. We were made very welcome at 11:45pm. We just wanted to rest and found the hotel quiet till about 7am ish and then we heard some aircraft noise. It is very close to airport. The room was just like most Premier Inn's and was clean. We went for breakfast in the pub just outside the door, (didnt have to out in the rain) The breakfast was one of the best we have had. Started with fresh fruit (there was also cereal) toast and then a freshly cooked breakfast with a freshly cooked egg. Plenty of juices tea and coffee. Was better than some five star hotel breakfasts we have had.
reviews.title: Good Welcome

reviews.text: We stayed in Premier Inn Cheadle with my friend for 4 days in July. Good connections to the airport, very kind and helpfull staff, excellent food and for example TGI Fridays and a big shopping center is just in the "backyard".
reviews.title: Good value for your money

reviews.text: There was a bit of airplane noises, but that didn´t come as a suprise, since it´s so close to the airport.
reviews.title: NYE 2012 Stay over

reviews.text: Perfect place, definately gonna use this hotel again, when visiting my friends!
reviews.title: Martin

reviews.text: We attend an event at the De Vere Cheadle House and was recommended to stay at the Premier Inn by a family member. Reviews were very positive and these were validated when we stayed. Lady on reception (cannot recall her name) was very welcoming and friendly and helped us with directions and information. Room was as you would expect but clean and provided the necessary items i.e., tea/coffee etc.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay for the money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We usually stay at the DeVere at Cheadle when flying early out of Manchester. This time we decided to book Premier Inn as we have previously had excellent stays at other sights.
reviews.title: Poor mattress and noisy floorboards but refund made

reviews.text: The room was of good size and clean and first impressions were very positive. However some insomniac above us seemed to want to floor walk all night and the floor boards were creaking. This together with a poor spring mattress led to an inadequates night's sleep. We left with the thought that we would be back at DeVere next time. However we did complete the comments card and have received a prompt reply from the Manager whilst away who has refunded our room fee under their good night's sleep policy. They are also going to replace the mattress. You have to be impressed with that and perhaps we should therefore give them another try on our next holiday.
reviews.title: Very Good Premier Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have marked our stay as average but the service (response) has been excellent and many other hotels could learn from such positive customer relations.
reviews.title: Safe, adequate
Don't bother with breakfast
reviews.text: Stopped at many Premier Inns with mixed results, this one was very good, everything worked including the wifi which can be hit and miss at some. Friendly helpful staff, ate at the Table Table restaurant which again the food was good and staff excellent. Also the breakfast the next morning was served piping hot.

one night stay to visit friends before flying out next morning-no room service and local places close at 10pm, bed comfy, room large, good shower pressure and hot water, clean, no frills but served it's purpose, close to airport and can walk to eateries, staff pleasant and helped printing boarding cards, limited electrical outlets near head of bed (no clock in room-standard for British hotels), plenty of storage space, no view, was quiet, parking on site difficult to find while local shoppes/gym/restaurants open-but is free, easy to find off main roundabout
reviews.title: Great service,everything you need

reviews.text: Stayed for 2 nights at £19 a night so couldn't complain for what we paid.
reviews.title: Hotel needs triple glazzing

reviews.text: Room was clean and had all of the premier inn things like king size bed, tv, etc
reviews.title: Nothing Premier But The Price!

reviews.text: Hotel is directly under the landing flight path so from 6am until 1am you can hear the noise. This isn't the hotels fault however the hotel could do with triple glazing like the premier inn at Heathrow bath road.
reviews.title: Great stay had by all

reviews.text: I've stayed in the 2 other premier inn Manchester airport hotels and you can't hear the plane noise.
reviews.title: Good budget hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would stay here again but only if I had an early flight.
reviews.title: Good Stay

reviews.text: Typical Premier Inn. Good clean and comfortable. Stayed 2 nights 28/29 December whilst visiting family nearby. Hotel was great value, perfectly located, massive supermarket and other shops etc nearby. Suited us perfectly.
reviews.title: Good, comfortable and surprisingly quiet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We expected to hear some aircraft noise as they are very low when passing over the hotel, but the triple glazing did the trick and we did not hear a think in the room until we opened the window slightly in the morning. The noisiest thing was the bathroom extractor fan. That was a bit of a nuisance, but not too bad. Used the shaving light instead for night time use.
reviews.title: friendly premier inn

reviews.text: Only had breakfast one morning on site as we ate with the family the rest of the time. No complaints about the breakfast.
reviews.title: Nice hotel shame about the food

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here on Christmas eve and Christmas day night. We arrived rather late but received a friendly helpful greeting. We were shown where our room was and when we got into our room there was a christmas card from the staff. What a kind thing to do.
reviews.title: Does the job, just.

reviews.text: The room was clean and tidy and we were very comfortable. We would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Basic but decent
